Title: Spellbound
Writer: Ben Hecht (screen play), John Palmer (suggested by novel: "The House of Dr. Edwardes"), Hilary St George Saunders (suggested by novel: "The House of Dr. Edwardes"), Angus MacPhail (adaptation)
Actors: Ingrid Bergman, Gregory Peck, Michael Chekhov, Leo G. Carroll
Plot: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.
Production: Selznick International Pictures, Vanguard Films Production
